scripts.deps:all: npm run deps:screenshot && npm run deps:graph && npm run deps:github && npm run deps:server && npm run deps:client
scripts.deps:graph: npx depcruise . --include-only "^src|^app" --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > tools/index.html
scripts.deps:screenshot: npx depcruise . --include-only "^src|^app" --output-type dot | dot -T svg > assets/deps.svg
scripts.deps:server: npx depcruise . --include-only "^src/server|^app" --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > tools/server-dependency-graph.html
scripts.deps:client: npx depcruise . --include-only "^src/client|^app" --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > tools/client-dependency-graph.html
